ctu_text:
Only family member will able to get the death benefits:

 - Depended parents. 
 - Spouse (Husband/Wife). 
 - Daughter. 
 - Son ( Only If below 21 years old)

", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The Nirman Kamgar Mrtyu Va Divyangta Sahayata Yojana Uttar Pradesh is a crucial scheme launched by the Uttar Pradesh government for the welfare of registered construction workers in the state. It provides financial assistance to the families of construction workers in case of death or disability due to accident or illness.
